eidolonunchained.codex.entry.advanced_mo: Comprehensive guide to magical creatures and their behaviors. Through careful observation, patterns emerge in how different undead creatures behave. Understanding these patterns is crucial for any aspiring necromancer or monster hunter.

Necromancers are powerful spellcasters that command undead minions. They appear in dark robes and can summon skeletons, zombies, and other undead creatures to fight for them. Necromancers drop valuable magical components when defeated, including soul shards and necromantic reagents.

Wraiths are ethereal undead that phase between dimensions. These spectral entities can move through walls and drain life energy from their victims. They are particularly dangerous in groups and vulnerable to silver weapons and holy magic.

Monster Behavior Patterns: Most undead are drawn to areas of high magical activity and negative energy. They become more aggressive during new moon phases and can sense soul energy from great distances.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.rare_monste: Documentation of unusual monster behaviors and variants. These elusive creatures appear only during the darkest nights and possess unique abilities that set them apart from common monsters.

Shadow Wraiths: Unlike common wraiths, shadow wraiths possess the ability to phase through solid matter and are nearly invisible to the naked eye. They are drawn to areas of intense magical activity and can drain soul energy from multiple targets simultaneously.

Frost Skeleton: These skeletal warriors have been corrupted by prolonged exposure to void energy. Unlike normal skeletons, they possess enhanced intelligence and can coordinate complex battle strategies.

Frost skeletons are immune to cold damage and their arrows inflict slowness on their targets. They are often found guarding ancient ruins and necromantic sites, making them formidable opponents even for experienced practitioners.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.advanced_su: For the Experienced Practitioner. Advanced wraith summoning requires precise control and understanding of spectral energies and ethereal manipulation.
Wraith Binding Protocols: The binding process involves three critical phases: 1) Preparation of the ethereal anchor, 2) Invocation of the wraith essence, 3) Establishment of the binding covenant.
Each phase must be completed with exact timing to prevent the wraith from becoming hostile or escaping the binding circle. Failure may result in permanent spectral contamination.
Bound Wraith: A spectral entity tethered to the summoner's will through advanced binding rituals. These creatures maintain their ethereal properties but are compelled to serve their master.

Physical Manifestation: Translucent, shifting ethereal form with glowing purple essence core. Leaves spectral frost trail. Height: 2.5 blocks. Binding lasts exactly 7 days and requires daily soul energy to maintain (5 energy per day).
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.crystal_rit: Advanced techniques for crystal-based magical workings. This improved approach to crystal rituals provides greater magical output through proper harmonic alignment. The key is understanding how different crystals interact with each other and the ambient magical field.
Proper crystal placement can increase ritual effectiveness by up to 300%%. The most powerful configurations use seven crystals arranged in specific geometric patterns.
Crystal Resonance Theory: Different crystals resonate at different magical frequencies. By understanding these frequencies, a practitioner can optimize their ritual setup for maximum efficiency.

Quartz provides stability and acts as a magical amplifier, while amethyst channels void energy and enhances spiritual connections. Combining multiple crystal types requires careful balance to prevent harmonic interference.

Advanced Configurations: Master practitioners can create complex crystal networks that maintain their charge for extended periods. These networks can be activated remotely and provide sustained magical effects over large areas.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.void_master: Expanding upon the knowledge of void amulets and void manipulation. Through extensive study of void amulets, you have learned to harness void energy in new ways.

Void Mastery Fundamentals: This knowledge allows for more efficient void manipulation and deeper understanding of the space between worlds. The void is not empty space, but rather a realm of infinite potential.

Advanced practitioners can draw upon this potential to perform feats that seem to defy the natural order. Master void practitioners can create stable portals between distant locations, manipulate gravity in localized areas, and even briefly step outside of normal time.

Enhanced Void Techniques: These abilities come with significant risks. Prolonged void exposure can lead to dimensional instability, where the practitioner begins to phase between realities involuntarily.

Zombie Variants: Standard zombies show remarkable adaptability to different magical environments. Their simple behavior patterns make them excellent subjects for studying basic necromantic principles.

Skeletal Behavior: Skeletons retain muscle memory from their previous lives, making them capable of using weapons and tools with surprising proficiency. This retained knowledge can be enhanced through necromantic manipulation.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.plants.magi: Research into plants affected by magical energies
Plants exposed to necromantic and void energies undergo remarkable transformations, developing properties useful for ritual components and alchemical applications.
Withered Plants: Dead and dying vegetation near necromantic sites develops enhanced magical conductivity. These plants can be harvested for use in dark rituals and void manipulation.

Nether Flora: Fungi from the Nether realm possess inherent resistance to corruption and can be used to stabilize volatile magical reactions. Their otherworldly nature makes them valuable for interdimensional workings.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.arcane_gold: Mastery of magical gold manipulation and refinement
Arcane gold represents the pinnacle of magical metallurgy, combining mundane gold with concentrated magical energies to create a material of extraordinary properties.
Enhanced Properties: Arcane gold conducts magical energy with minimal loss, making it ideal for crafting focus items and ritual implements. Its lustrous appearance also masks darker magical auras.
Alchemical Refinement: Advanced practitioners can further purify arcane gold through crucible processes, creating ultra-pure ingots that amplify magical effects by up to 200%.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.pewter.enha: Advanced techniques for working with magical pewter alloys
Pewter's malleable nature makes it an excellent medium for magical inscription and enchantment. Unlike other metals, pewter readily accepts and holds magical charges.
Advanced Alloys: By adding trace amounts of silver and void essence during smelting, pewter develops enhanced magical conductivity and resistance to corruption.

Smelting Techniques: The key to high-quality magical pewter lies in maintaining precise temperature control during the smelting process. Too much heat burns away the magical properties, while too little fails to properly bind the metals.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.soul_gems.a: Mastery of soul binding and ethereal energy manipulation
Soul gems represent crystallized life force, containing vast amounts of spiritual energy that can be harnessed for powerful magical workings.
Soul Binding: The process of binding souls to gems requires precise ritual timing and proper containment circles. Improperly bound souls may escape or become hostile.
Summoning Applications: Charged soul gems provide the energy needed for advanced summoning rituals, acting as spiritual anchors that stabilize summoned entities in our realm.

eidolonunchained.codex.entry.wicked_sign: Mastery of dark inscription techniques and malevolent magic
Wicked signs channel malevolent energies and corrupt intentions into physical manifestations. These powerful symbols can curse enemies, weaken defenses, and amplify dark magical workings.
Dark Ink Preparation: The ink used for wicked signs must be prepared under specific conditions - during new moon phases, using materials tainted by suffering and corruption.

Sign Placement: Wicked signs must be inscribed with intent and malice. The location of placement affects the sign's power - crossroads, graveyards, and sites of tragedy provide the strongest resonance.

Dark Energies: Once activated, wicked signs create auras of malevolent energy that affect both living creatures and magical workings within their influence. These effects intensify with time and repeated use.
eidolonunchained.codex.entry.sacred_sign: Holy inscription techniques for protection and purification
Sacred signs channel divine energies and benevolent intentions into protective wards. These blessed symbols can heal the wounded, purify corruption, and provide sanctuary against dark forces.
Blessed Materials: Sacred signs require pure materials blessed by divine ritual. Holy water, consecrated silver, and prayers of dedication imbue the inscriptions with celestial power.
Purification Effects: Active sacred signs cleanse nearby areas of corruption and negative energy. Undead creatures suffer damage when approaching these blessed inscriptions.

Protective Properties: Sacred signs create auras of divine protection that strengthen allies and weaken enemies aligned with darkness. These effects are most powerful during daylight hours and holy celebrations.
